= Introduction =

All Concordion.NET project should follow a similar pattern, based on the pattern of projects recommended by Microsoft.  The main guide on MSDN can be found [http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms998208.aspx here] but I have found [http://mikehadlow.blogspot.com/2007/07/how-to-structure-visual-studio.html this] blog article to be useful as well.
